statements: SELECT task_id, dependency_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies WHERE dependency_id = 5;
SELECT task_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE dependency_id > 3 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT dependency_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id < 4;
SELECT task_id, COUNT(dependency_id) AS num_dependencies FROM task_dependencies GROUP BY task_id HAVING COUNT(dependency_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies WHERE dependency_id = 5 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, COUNT(dependency_id) AS num_dependencies FROM task_dependencies GROUP BY task_id HAVING num_dependencies > 3;
SELECT task_id, dependency_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT DISTINCT task_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE dependency_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, dependent_task_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM task_executions WHERE execution_time BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) FROM task_dependencies GROUP BY task_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(execution_time) FROM task_executions;
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, dependent_task_id FROM task_dependencies ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, COUNT(dependent_task_id) AS num_dependents FROM task_dependencies GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT task_id, MAX(execution_time) AS latest_execution FROM task_executions GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT te.execution_id, td.task_id, te.execution_time FROM task_executions te INNER JOIN task_dependencies td ON te.task_id = td.task_id WHERE td.task_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM TaskDependencies;
SELECT task_id, dependent_task_id FROM TaskDependencies ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name FROM TaskDetails WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM TaskDetails WHERE task_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedule WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskDetails WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskDetails WHERE task_id > 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM TaskDetails JOIN TaskDependencies ON TaskDetails.task_id = TaskDependencies.task_id;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedule JOIN TaskDetails ON TaskSchedule.task_id = TaskDetails.task_id WHERE scheduled_time > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;

SELECT TaskSchedule.schedule_id, TaskDetails.task_name, TaskDetails.task_description FROM TaskSchedule JOIN TaskDetails ON TaskSchedule.task_id = TaskDetails.task_id WHERE TaskSchedule.schedule_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks WHERE dependency_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name AS TaskName, COUNT(*) AS TotalTasks FROM tasks GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT assignee, deadline FROM assigned_tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT th.execution_date, th.status, th.remarks, t.task_name FROM task_history th JOIN tasks t ON th.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT dependency_id, dependent_id FROM task_dependencies WHERE dependency_id > 5;
SELECT assignee, deadline FROM assigned_tasks WHERE deadline <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT execution_date, status FROM task_history WHERE status IN ('Completed', 'In Progress');
SELECT task_name, assignee FROM tasks t INNER JOIN assigned_tasks at ON t.task_id = at.task_id WHERE assignee = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE dependency_id IS NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks WHERE dependency_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, dependency_name FROM tasks JOIN dependencies ON tasks.dependency_id = dependencies.dependency_id;
SELECT task_id, task_name, log_message FROM tasks JOIN task_logs ON tasks.task_id = task_logs.task_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, status FROM tasks JOIN task_status ON tasks.task_id = task_status.task_id WHERE status = 'Completed';
